description: Unique identifier of the sample from the Sanger sequencing manifest form.
Participant identifier from clinical team. Note this as not unique for each row as multiple biopsy_type are taken from each participant.
Name of the person who performed the single cell experiment.
Time from biopsy collection to when the biopsy was processed and run on the 10x Chromium machine.
Date when biopsy was collected from Addenbrooke's Hospital.
